workshoptitle: Design Different Topologies with Oracle GoldenGate 23ai

tutorials.title: Get started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create SSH keys using Oracle Cloud Shell
tutorials.description: How to generate SSH keys using Oracle cloud shell

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Use noVNC remote desktop
tutorials.description: How to get started with your workshop with a remote desktop session.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Set Up Unidirectional Data Replication Environment Using REST API
tutorials.description: Configure data replication using the automation scripts containing REST API cURL commands.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Set Up Unidirectional Data Replication Environment Using Admin Client
tutorials.description: Configure data replication using the automation scripts containing Admin Client OBEY scripts.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Set Up Bidirectional Data Replication Environment Using REST API
tutorials.description: Configure data replication using the automation scripts containing REST API cURL commands.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Set Up Bidirectional Data Replication Environment Using Admin Client
tutorials.description: Configure data replication using the automation scripts containing Admin Client OBEY scripts.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
